org.rapla.facade

Interface CalendarOptions


  • public interface CalendarOptions
    This class contains the configuration options for the calendar views like Worktimes and dates configuration is done in the calendar option menu. Hours belonging to the worktime get a different color in the weekview. This is also the minimum interval that will be used for printing.
    Excluded Days are only visible, when there is an appointment to display.
